body_html: Hmm, no, it needs to be fixed where mailing jobs are enqueued. Currently, when you add an address to CC for a mailing, it will enqueue a mailing job for each address, including CC and BCC. So whoever get's CC'ed gets one copy per recipient.
body_text: Hmm, no, it needs to be fixed where mailing jobs are enqueued. Currently, when you add an address to CC for a mailing, it will enqueue a mailing job for each address, including CC and BCC. So whoever get's CC'ed gets one copy per recipient.
body: Hmm, no, it needs to be fixed where mailing jobs are enqueued. Currently, when you add an address to CC for a mailing, it will enqueue a mailing job for each address, including CC and BCC. So whoever get's CC'ed gets one copy per recipient.
